subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: The retired N.B.A. star Jayson Williams will remain free on bail after a judge in Somerville, N.J., rejected a prosecutor’s request to revoke the bail and send him to prison.
snippet: The retired N.B.A. star Jayson Williams will remain free on bail after a judge in Somerville, N.J., rejected a prosecutor’s request to revoke the bail and send him to prison.
